protocol.details: Records the selection of a crystal from a successful trial, for further treatment. Used by the Select Crystal user interface.
protocol.name: Select Crystal

parameterDefinition.name: Temperature
parameterDefinition.label: The temperature at which the plate was stored

parameterDefinition.name: Crystal number
parameterDefinition.label: An identifier for the crystal. Should be unique within a given drop. Don't change this, it's set automatically.

parameterDefinition.name: r
parameterDefinition.label: The radius from the centre, to contain the crystal

parameterDefinition.name: x
parameterDefinition.label: The x co-ordinate of the crystal centre

parameterDefinition.name: y
parameterDefinition.label: The y co-ordinate of the crystal centre
